channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Fountain -- WP Fountain
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Fountain -- WP Fountain

item.title: CVE-2021-34653|2024-09-17T03:08:32.754Z -- wp%20fountain -- wp%20fountain
item.description: The WP Fountain WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] in the ~/wp-fountain.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.5.9.
